title: Adobe Flash not working
content: I have windows 10 and already have the adobe flash but cannot access my KIZOA page because it requires Adobe Flash and there is NO little brick icon in the address space to click to ALLOW. What is wrong??? I REALLY need to get into this page to work on projects! What can I do??? THANKS!
creator: HappyTrailz

title: Logging into Gmail and Facebook
content: When I try to get to Gmail and Facebook, I always have to log in, even though "Save this Browser" is always selected. This causes a problem as I have to have my phone with me for two-step log-ins. This problem started about a month ago, and inquiries to Gmail and Facebook have all gone unanswered. When I do log in, I get a message "We noticed an unusual login from a device or location you don't usually use. Was this you?" This isn't a device I don't normally use, it is one I use most of the time. I don't understand why this is happening and what I can do about it.
creator: harveastman

title: www.wunderground.com
content: www.wunderground.com works on chrome but just hangs on firefox ... this is new in the last few days ...
creator: oldunclejosh

title: Duplicate Bookmark entries
content:
Win 7 Pro, 64-bit, FF 81.0.2, 32-bit.

It appears that FF will not permit me to enter a duplicate bookmark. However, there are times when I would like the same bookmark to appear in more that one location. Is there a way to do this?
creator: LesF

title: Error "No se ha conectado: Posible problema de seguridad" cuando quiero buscar a través de Google
content:
Cuando intento buscar algo por el buscador de Firefox que utiliza Google para buscar me salta el mensaje: No se ha conectado: Posible problema de seguridad

Firefox ha detectado una potencial amenaza de seguridad y no ha continuado a www.google.com porque este sitio web requiere una conexión segura. 

Y al ir a la sección de "Avanzado" dice esto:

Los sitios web prueban su identidad mediante certificados. Firefox no confía en este sitio porque utiliza un certificado que no es válido para www.google.com. El certificado solo es válido para los siguientes nombres: www.google.com.ar, *.google.com.ar, google.com.ar

Código de error: SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER

Investigué pero no pude encontrar como arreglar este problema, vi que se pedia este texto asi que lo pongo acá por las dudas

END CERTIFICATE-----

title: Parler
